recipesJson.name: Cinn Apple Ice Cream "CAP Version" v4
recipesJson.author: DaddyKane91
recipesJson.description: doin some lab work with different Ice creams hope everyone enjoys choose your IC

reviews.text: not to bad mate i have given it 7 days steep but may need longer i can see why you call it cinn apple with that apple filling so high just imo it is a bit to high and i feel like i needed more cream or sweetener to dull down a sort of whisky bourbon taste i get from the apple filling. thanks for sharing
